msbt.message: It's hard to believe I won't be on the island much longer now.I suppose I should say my goodbyes to everyone today since I'll be packing all day tomorrow. It will also give the poor dears more time to come to grips with my departure.
Oh ! Now that I'm actually moving, I'm feeling unexpectedly emotional about it all.I have so many conflicting feelings to contemplate! I should probably wait until tomorrow to start packing.

Deliver my change of address form to Resident Servicesget cardboard boxes for packing What else? Goodness, so much to do and so little time! Moving is SUCH a chore. And yet, I'm quite upbeat about it!
